---
name: New Skill Proposal
about: Propose a new skill for the collection
title: "[Skill Proposal] "
labels: skill-proposal
---

## Skill Name

The proposed name for the skill (lowercase kebab-case).

## Description

What does this skill do? What problem does it solve?

## Category

[e.g., Finance, Banking, Tax, Insurance, Investing]

## Use Case

Describe a typical use case. Who would use this skill and when?

## Implementation Notes

Any technical considerations, data sources, or dependencies this skill would need.
